This translation was created by Evilhack28 and Evilgirl. We are not affiliated with the game or its developers in any way.

This is completely free. You will never be asked to pay me personally or to subscribe to anything in order to access it.
If you paid for this translation, you were scammed.

Important Notice:
You may not use any part of this file in your own translation—not even a single line—without permission.
We’ve included unique markers to identify misuse, so if you copy our work, we’ll know.

==========================
 Evil Translation - Info
==========================

File Type        : Text-based (v3.7.3 server 4)
Current Version  : 1.10.4 (pre-release)
Last Modified By : Evilhack28
GitHub           : https://github.com/evilhack28/eviltranslation
Discord          : https://discord.com/invite/ngTHrgMVuw

[NORMAL_REGENERATION]
Damaged medical box

[NORMAL_REGENERATION_DES]
Expired pills must not be taken, not only can they not treat you, they are also damaging!

[NORMAL_REGENERATION_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Heals a tiny amount of plant's health every 3 seconds. ^FF0000 Does not work on instant-use plants.

[MAGIC_REGENERATION]
Basic medical box 

[MAGIC_REGENERATION_DES]
Plants can feel the great pain when they are hurt, they must be treated as soon as possible to not have any sequelae.

[MAGIC_REGENERATION_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Heals a small amount of plant's health every 3 seconds. ^FF0000 Does not work on instant-use plants.

[EPIC_REGENERATION]
Advanced medical box

[EPIC_REGENERATION_DES]
Wall-nut, Tall-nut and Infi-nut often fight over this box instead of sharing it.

[EPIC_REGENERATION_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Heals an average amount of plant's health every 3 seconds. ^FF0000 Does not work on instant-use plants.

[UNIQUE_REGENERATION]
Universal medical box

[UNIQUE_REGENERATION_DES]
Wounds on the surface can be treated easily, but those deep in the heart can only be left to time.

[UNIQUE_REGENERATION_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Heals a great amount of plant's health every 3 seconds. ^FF0000 Does not work on instant-use plants.

[NORMAL_DRUM]
Damaged bucket

[NORMAL_DRUM_DES]
Dave found this bucket when cleaning the lawn, seems to be leaking water......

[NORMAL_DRUM_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's defense by 5%. ^FF0000 Does not work on instant-use plants.

[MAGIC_DRUM]
Basic bucket

[MAGIC_DRUM_DES]
Magnet-shroom collected them with hard work, now they will have great uses!

[MAGIC_DRUM_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's defense by 10%. ^FF0000 Does not work on instant-use plants.

[EPIC_DRUM]
Refined bucket

[EPIC_DRUM_DES]
Magnet-shroom collected the iron buckets and modified them, making the surface smoother and tougher!

[EPIC_DRUM_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's defense by 15%. ^FF0000 Does not work on instant-use plants.

[UNIQUE_DRUM]
Spacetime Bucket

[UNIQUE_DRUM_DES]
Not even zombies have such a bucket, it is said that wearing it allows you to travel through spacetime.

[UNIQUE_DRUM_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's defense by 20%. ^FF0000 Does not work on instant-use plants.

[NORMAL_FERTILIZER]
Expired fertilizers

[NORMAL_FERTILIZER_DES]
The nutrients in the fertilizer has mostly been lost, you can still squeeze out a tiny bit if you try.

[NORMAL_FERTILIZER_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's damage by 5%.

[MAGIC_FERTILIZER]
Basic fertilizer

[MAGIC_FERTILIZER_DES]
Plants can only grow strong if they are regularly fertilized, but the smell is just...... unbearable!

[MAGIC_FERTILIZER_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's damage by 10%.

[EPIC_FERTILIZER]
Advanced Fertilizer

[EPIC_FERTILIZER_DES]
From this smell, it has to be the true all-natural non-toxic organic fertilizer!

[EPIC_FERTILIZER_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's damage by 15%.

[UNIQUE_FERTILIZER]
Rare Fertilizer

[UNIQUE_FERTILIZER_DES]
One bag is the equivalent of five, my back legs no longer hurt, I can beat up five zombies at once!

[UNIQUE_FERTILIZER_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's damage by 20%. ^FF0000 For attack plants only

[MAGIC_TORCH]
Basic torch

[MAGIC_TORCH_DES]
The plants hate the zombies' torches, so they made one themselves, but it has a different effect.

[MAGIC_TORCH_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's fire damage by 12%.

[EPIC_TORCH]
Refined torch

[EPIC_TORCH_DES]
You are like the fire in winter, the heating flames warmed my heart

[EPIC_TORCH_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's fire damage by 18%.

[UNIQUE_TORCH]
Burning Torch

[UNIQUE_TORCH_DES]
Squeeze dry the barks and rip them into long stripes, tie them up with a rattan cane, that's how you make a torch!

[UNIQUE_TORCH_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's fire damage by 24%

[MAGIC_SNOWFLAKE]
Basic Snowflake

[MAGIC_SNOWFLAKE_DES]
reserving a snowflake is not an easy task, this is only a replica......

[MAGIC_SNOWFLAKE_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's ice damage by 12%.

[EPIC_SNOWFLAKE]
Refined Snowflake

[EPIC_SNOWFLAKE_DES]
A pure silver pendant, Dave's mother's mother's mother gave it to him.

[EPIC_SNOWFLAKE_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's ice damage by 18%.

[UNIQUE_SNOWFLAKE]
Sparkling Snowflake

[UNIQUE_SNOWFLAKE_DES]
This is a real snowflake, see that sparkle? There is a spirit in every snowflake.

[UNIQUE_SNOWFLAKE_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's ice damage by 24%.

[MAGIC_POLE]
Basic Pole

[MAGIC_POLE_DES]
Every power pole has its own code, which can be used to locate them.

[MAGIC_POLE_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's lightning damage by 12%.

[EPIC_POLE]
Sturdy Pole

[EPIC_POLE_DES]
There is always a line of sparrows on the pole, squeaking and tweeting the latest gossips.

[EPIC_POLE_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's lightning damage by 18%.

[UNIQUE_POLE]
Gargantuar's Pole

[UNIQUE_POLE_DES]
The earliest power poles were wooden, only some time later where they constructed with reinforced concrete.

[UNIQUE_POLE_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's lightning damage by 24%.

[EPIC_EXPLODE]
Advanced Powder keg

[EPIC_EXPLODE_DES]
Snapdragon has always wanted to have a peek into the powder keg, but other plants never let him get close to it.

[EPIC_EXPLODE_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's explosive damage by 18%.

[UNIQUE_EXPLODE]
Super Powder keg

[UNIQUE_EXPLODE_DES]
It says "No Fire", but there's no time to listen to that when zombies are attacking!

[UNIQUE_EXPLODE_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Increases plant's explosive damage by 24%.

[EPIC_CLOCK]
Delicate Alarm Clock

[EPIC_CLOCK_DES]
Early birds catch the worms, so worms are waking up late.

[EPIC_CLOCK_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Decreases plant's recharge time by 10%. ^FFFF00 not seed packet (i.e. Spring Bean's sleeping time)

[UNIQUE_CLOCK]
Dave's Alarm Clock

[UNIQUE_CLOCK_DES]
Dave thinks traditional alarm clocks are more reliable, that's why he's still keeping this out-of-battery alarm clock.

[UNIQUE_CLOCK_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Decreases plant's recharge time by 20%. ^FFFF00 not seed packet (i.e. Spring Bean's sleeping time)

[EPIC_COST]
Energy-Saving Pot

[EPIC_COST_DES]
Both kids and plants need to stay under the sun more to grow healthily.

[EPIC_COST_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Decreases plant's sun cost by 10.

[UNIQUE_COST]
Solar Power Flower Pot

[UNIQUE_COST_DES]
A solar powered heater, um, I mean flower pot, having mystical powers.

[UNIQUE_COST_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Reduces sun cost by 25 and gives slightly more defense.^FF0000 Level 4 plants with sun cost higher than 100 only.

[UNIQUE_DUCK]
Yellow Ducky Tube

[UNIQUE_DUCK_DES]
It's safer to have a swimming tube when swimming by the sea, but Tangle Kelp can't fathom why.

[UNIQUE_DUCK_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Non-aquatic plants can be planted on water and have slightly more defense.^FF0000 Non-aquatic Level 4 plants only.

[UNIQUE_SUNMONEY]
Sun-Concentrating Flower Pot

[UNIQUE_SUNMONEY_DES]
This flower pot can save a lot of sun in case it's needed.

[UNIQUE_SUNMONEY_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Produces 25 more sun and gives slightly more defense. ^FF0000 Level 4 plants only

[UNIQUE_ACCELERATE]
Speed-Up Flower Pot

[UNIQUE_ACCELERATE_DES]
There is a sign on the side. "Less work, more gain."

[UNIQUE_ACCELERATE_BOOST_DES]
Effect: Reduces plant's recharge time by 30% and gives them slightly more defense. ^FF0000 Level 4 plants only.

[SUPER_CLOCK]
Purple Gloves

[SUPER_CLOCK_DES]
Dave's new gloves, the fashion aura on them makes his dance even more charming!

[SUPER_CLOCK_BOOST_DES]
Effect 1: Increase attack power by 12%
Effect 2: Attack speed increased by 5%
Effect 3: Locked

Effect 2: Attack speed increased by 20%
Effect 3: Killing zombies have a 18% chance of generating plant food

[ZOMBIIIIIIIIIIIIIIES]





[ZOMBIE_MUMMY]
Mummy Zombie

[ZOMBIE_MUMMY_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Regular mummified zombie

[ZOMBIE_MUMMY_DESCRIPTION]
{FLAVOR}Is he a mummy? Is he a zombie? It turns out he's a zombie who's rolled himself in toilet paper to protect his fair skin. True fact!

[ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR1]
Conehead Mummy

[ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
His cobra cone headdress makes him twice as tough as normal mummies.

[ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION]
{FLAVOR}Conehead Mummy Zombie prefers the circular cone shape over the typical pyramid shape. It's a fashion thing, and Conehead Mummy Zombie always stays ahead of fashion.

[ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR2]
Buckethead Mummy

[ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
His sandy bucket greatly protects him from damage.

[ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT}High defense, use a plant foood to fight him!

{FLAVOR}Buckethead Mummy Zombie graduated Magna Zom Louder from Zombie Academy where he learned to utilize his diaphragm during groaning lessons.

[ZOMBIE_MUMMY_FLAG]
Flag Mummy Zombie

[ZOMBIE_MUMMY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Marks the arrival of a huge sandy "wave" of zombies.

[ZOMBIE_MUMMY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION]
{FLAVOR}Egyptian Flag Zombie is so far behind he thinks he's in first place. He's clearly living in de-Nile.

[ZOMBIE_RA]
Ra Zombie

[ZOMBIE_RA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Tries to steal sun, just for safe keeping.

[ZOMBIE_RA_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT} tries to steal sun
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT} If you kill him you get your sun back

{FLAVOR}Ra Zombie isn't actually named after the Sun God Ra, though that's a common mistake. He just likes to say "Ra" a lot.

[ZOMBIE_CAMEL_ALMANAC]
Camel Zombies

[ZOMBIE_CAMEL_ALMANAC_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Arrives in step with other Camel Zombies.

[ZOMBIE_CAMEL_ALMANAC_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT} arrives in a group of three zombies or more
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT} Plants that can attack a whole row of zombies are their fear.

{FLAVOR}There is only one camel, really!...

{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT} Plants that can attack a whole row of zombies are their bane.

{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT} cold attacks extinguish torch

{FLAVOR}His impressive friendly mutton chops has always kept food in them for weeks, making sure his explorations are filled with snacks.

[ZOMBIE_TOMB_RAISER]
Tomb Raiser Zombie

{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT} Use Grave Buster to eat tombstones, and use Cabbage-pult to directly attack zombies behind tombstones.

{FLAVOR}He dreams about playing fetch, running for brains. He loves burying himself in the yard, and is not yet indoor trained. He's still looking for his tail.

[ZOMBIE_PHARAOH]
Pharaoh Zombie

[ZOMBIE_PHARAOH_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
His sarcophagus greatly protects him but slows down a rather fast zombie.

[ZOMBIE_PHARAOH_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Speed Details: {STAT} moves like a hungry zombie once free
{KEYWORD}Weakness: {STAT} Wall-nuts can hold him for a while, but use Plant Food to eliminate him quickly is safer.

{FLAVOR}The second cousin once removed of King Rot, he rose to power with his disappearing sarcophagus act, but met his untimely end in an unfortunate goat accident. His tale is told in great detail on the back of his sarcophagus, which no one will ever see.

[ZOMBIE_EGYPT_IMP]
Imp Mummy

Thrown over most of your defenses, then slinks onward.

[ZOMBIE_EGYPT_IMP_DESCRIPTION]
{FLAVOR}Imp Mummy prefers to laze around the tomb, hop up on the urns, and stratch at the sarcophagi. The sound of him coughing up a hairball is one you will never forget.

{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT} launches Imp Mummy when damaged
 
{FLAVOR}True Fact #1: The pyramids were built in an attempt to make Mummified Gargantuar seem small. It didn't work. True Fact #2: The Sphinx isn't missing its nose... that is the face of... Gargantuar.

The Qi Grandmaster can activate Golden Bell Shield.
This shield comes in ice and fire variants - you must deal damage to its toughness bar using the opposing element. While shielded, the Qi Grandmaster gradually regenerates health up to the phase limit.

[ZOMBIE_DARK_WIZARD_ELITE]
Elite Dark Wizard Zombie

[ZOMBIE_DARK_WIZARD_ELITE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
The Elite Dark Wizard Zombie has a resilience bar mechanism; physical attacks can reduce its resilience (stunning effects can cause high reductions). Emptying the resilience bar puts the zombie into a weakened state, during which the zombie will not act or attack until the resilience bar is fully restored. While the zombie has resilience, it provides damage absorption limits.

[ZOMBIE_DARK_WIZARD_ELITE_DESCRIPTION]
At a certain wizard conference, a well-informed wizard zombie suggested that a magic book could be used to prop up a table corner. This shocked all the zombies present.
From then on, those who successfully learned this advanced technology became the elite among wizard zombies.

The ravenous engine of carnage from the murky depths.

[ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_BEACH_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT} mouth turbine can pull plants to it
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT} summoned zombie sharks can consume plants

{FLAVOR}The Zombot Sharktronic Sub is a true labor of love. Dr. Zomboss obsessed over every detail of the aquatic mechanism of doom as he worked on it day in and day out from the wee hours of the morning until well after dark. He carefully handcrafted the shark's nearly impenetrable skin. He shaved each razor-sharp tooth to a point by hand. And he painstakingly installed the lethal plant-consuming fan inside the machines' horrific maw all by himself. Zomboss shed more than one tear of joy when his masterpiece was complete. Say what you will about the evil genius, but he is quite passionate about his projects.

位移换行：每隔一段时间，移动至其他行末尾并行进。

[ZOMBIE_JOURNEY_TO_THE_WEST_HUANGMEI_DESCRIPTION]

召唤僵尸：挥动狼牙棒，召唤大量西游僵尸进攻。
人种袋：投掷人种袋，吸取整行所有植物，可用灰烬破坏。
金钵：投掷金钵，砸扁 2x2 范围内的所有植物。
位移换行：不会往前走，每隔一段时间移动至其他行。

Effect.

he trigger probability of Gravitational Entanglement is increased by 100%, and there is a 30% probability of gravitational restraint effect on small and medium-sized zombies.

[ORCHIDMAGE_SKILL_LEVEL5]
Gravitational Black Whole

[ORCHIDMAGE_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
When there are 3 small gravitational balls, they will be launched together when attacking, and a black hole will be generated for 3 seconds after the explosion. The black hole will cause 1 damage per second and pull the surrounding small and medium zombies for 0.5 blocks and large zombies for 0.3 blocks. The small and medium-sized zombies in the center will be dragged into the black hole and killed instantly. The small gravitational ball recovers 1 every 10 seconds.

[ORCHIDMAGE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]
When a zombie appears on the right side, a gravitational ball flying to the right is fired, and the gravitational ball explodes to cause damage to the surrounding 3x3 zombies as it passes through the first zombie 1 square, and pulls the zombie 0.5 square toward the center. When a zombie appears in the 1 square on the right, a small gravitational ball overhead is fired out to repel a single zombie in the 1 square.

[ORCHIDMAGE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
When the gravitational ball deals damage to zombies, there is a 15% chance to cause gravitational binding effect on small and medium-sized zombies.

[ORCHIDMAGE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL3_DES]
he trigger probability of Gravitational Entanglement is increased by 100%, and there is a 30% probability of gravitational restraint effect on small and medium-sized zombies.

[ORCHIDMAGE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL4_DES]
There is a high probability of be boosted

[ORCHIDMAGE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
When there are 3 small gravitational balls, they will be launched together when attacking, and a black hole will be generated for 3 seconds after the explosion. The black hole will cause 1 damage per second and pull the surrounding small and medium zombies for 0.5 blocks and large zombies for 0.3 blocks. The small and medium-sized zombies in the center will be dragged into the black hole and killed instantly. The small gravitational ball recovers 1 every 10 seconds.

[ORCHIDMAGE_AVATAR_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]

The poisoning effect will cause attack damage per second, and then the potion will disappear. Toxic fog does not affect the planting of plants.

Plants cannot be grown on the crater.

After a period of time, the crack cracks and the eyeball appears. Clicking on the eyeball releases light and causes damage to all zombies, The more zombies the plant body devours, the more damage the eyeball causes

[CTHULHUACTINIA_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
The digestion time is reduced to 15 seconds, the eye bud will open after digestion, and the attack power will increase to 60/shot & 600.

[CTHULHUACTINIA_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL3_DES]
The digestion time is reduced to 10 seconds, the eye bud will open after digestion, and the attack power will increase to 80/shot & 800.

Energy Splash

[NIGHTCAP_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
Every time Nightcap attacks, there is a 15% chance to fuse all small energy balls into a large energy ball, which is then fired and disappears at the 6th tile at front. During which, when the large energy ball hits a zombie, 1 small energy ball will be spawned on each of the nearby rows for every tile it travels. The small energy balls spawned will travel perpendicular to the locus of the large energy ball until they hit a zombie or leave the lawn. They explode upon hitting a zombie, damaging all zombies within the same tile can deal Stun I for 0.5 seconds.

[NIGHTCAP_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]

When the plant is attacked or controlled, it will enter the dark night form, immune to this attack or control, during which the plant will not be harmed, the dark night form lasts for 10 seconds and enters a 10-second cooldown after the end. When the zombies enter the 4 squares on the right side of the dark night mushroom, the dark night mushroom will attack all the zombies in the 4 squares, causing damage to the zombies and slowing down the zombies and ^701edf^ poisoningⅠ^oldclrr.

ttack range increased by 1 tile again. Eel movement speed increased by 20% again.

[ELECTRICPEEL_SKILL_LEVEL5]
Lightning Eel

[ELECTRICPEEL_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
When attacking, Electric Peel has a 20% chance to throw a lightning eel which moves forwards, binding the first bindable zombie it encounters. It will then electrocute every 3 seconds, dealing damage within the tile, dealing Paralyze I to the zombie bound for 1.5 seconds, and splash damage that is half of the original damage to zombies in a 3*3 area. The electric eel can last for at most 10 seconds, dealing damage that is 150% of the original damage to the zombie it binds to or non-bindable zombies it passed through.

[ELECTRICPEEL_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]
When zombies appear within a 4-tile range to the right, Electric Peel releases an electric eel that moves forward to the farthest edge of its attack range before returning. The eel deals damage to any zombies it collides with during its journey. When planted in water, the eel's attack power increases, and it generates lightning across the water surface. This lightning strikes zombies every 0.5 seconds, causing damage. The lightning effect vanishes 1 second after the eel exits the water.

[ELECTRICPEEL_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
Attack range increased by 1 tile. Eel movement speed increased by 20%.

[ELECTRICPEEL_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL3_DES]
ttack range increased by 1 tile again. Eel movement speed increased by 20% again.

When planting multiple Daturas, starting from the 3rd note, the damage range increases to 3×3, and from the 5th note onwards, the range expands to 5×5.

[HEAVENDATURA_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]

Mana Rises

[TWINSHONEYSUCKLE_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
The golden flower and the silver flower's rest time is reduced by 5 seconds, the number of blue stars produced after the explosion of the moon and the sun is increased by 4, and the number of red stars is increased by 2.

Assisted Shooting

[TWINSHONEYSUCKLE_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]

[TWINSHONEYSUCKLE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]
After planting the Lunisolar Honeysuckle, the Silver Flower in front will periodically launch moons that track the nearest zombie on screen, dealing ice damage. After the moon explodes, it will release blue stars that deal ice damage. Clicking will switch the Golden Flower to the front, and it will launch suns at zombies in front, dealing area fire damage. After the sun explodes, it will release red stars that deal fire damage. The attack cooldowns of the Golden Flower and Silver Flower are calculated separately.

[TWINSHONEYSUCKLE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
The golden flower and the silver flower's rest time is reduced by 2.5 seconds, the number of blue stars produced after the explosion of the moon and the sun is increased by 2, and the number of red stars is increased by 1.

[TWINSHONEYSUCKLE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL3_DES]
The golden flower and the silver flower's rest time is reduced by 5 seconds, the number of blue stars produced after the explosion of the moon and the sun is increased by 4, and the number of red stars is increased by 2.

[TWINSHONEYSUCKLE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL4_DES]
There is a high chance to be boosted when planted!

[TWINSHONEYSUCKLE_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
Both flowers of Lunisolar Honeysuckle will summon their respective projectiles which will travel a short distance ahead before combining and exploding, dealing extreme damage in a 5x5 area.

[TWINSHONEYSUCKLE_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]

[RHUBARBARIAN_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]

Barbarian Power

[RHUBARBARIAN_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
There is a chance of entering the violent mode after jumping. Attacks in the violent mode have a chance of instantly killing small and medium-sized zombies, or causing high damage and stun to mechanical zombies and Gargantuars. The violent mode ends after jumping back to the original place.

[RHUBARBARIAN_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL1_DES]
Rhubarbarian has basic melee attack abilities, targeting a single zombie within 1 tile in front. Additionally, it possesses a jumping skill that activates when zombies are within 3 tiles ahead. It will jump 1 tile forward and begin attacking. If zombies are too close, it jumps in place, stunning all zombies in its own tile and the tile directly in front. If Rhubarbarian jumps forward, it will return to its original tile after the stun effect ends. The jumping skill has an internal cooldown of several seconds.

[RHUBARBARIAN_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL2_DES]
The maximum jumping range is increased by 1 tile, and the stun duration and attack duration are both increased by 1 second.

[RHUBARBARIAN_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL3_DES]
The maximum jumping range is increased by 2 tiles, and the stun duration and attack duration are both increased by 2 seconds.

[RHUBARBARIAN_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL4_DES]
Rhubarbarian may be boosted when planted.

[RHUBARBARIAN_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
There is a chance of entering the violent mode after jumping. Attacks in the violent mode have a chance of instantly killing small and medium-sized zombies, or causing high damage and stun to mechanical zombies and Gargantuars. The violent mode ends after jumping back to the original place.

[RHUBARBARIAN_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]
Rhubarbarian will slam the ground 3 times moving forward on the lawn if there are zombies in his tile range. Once he does all his slams, he will return to his normal position.

[RHUBARBARIAN_AVATAR_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]
Rhubarbarian will slam the ground 4 times moving forward on the lawn if there are zombies in his tile range. Once he does all his slams, he will return to his normal position.

Aerial Technology

[EYWA_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
The first time she pinches a soldier, the tank soldier will be pinched directly. When the tank soldier jumps out of the tank and disappears in the air, there is a chance that a plane will appear to catch him, drop an additional nuclear bomb and then fly away. The nuclear bomb has a 3×3 explosion range, causing damage and degradation effects to zombies within the range.

[EYWA_NEW_SKILL_LEVEL5_DES]
The first plant minion created will directly be a Tank Minion. The Tank Minion jumps out of the tank, and during its disappearance in the air, there is a chance that a plane will appear to catch the minion, drop a nuclear bomb, and fly away. The nuclear bomb has a 3×3 explosion range, dealing damage and causing the degeneration effect to zombies within the range.

[EYWA_PLANTFOOD_DESCRIPTION]

[ADVICE_TUTORIAL_TITLE]
Hints

[ADVICE_TUTORIAL_RULE]
Please follow the hints!

[ADVICE_ANIM_PLANT_SUNFLOWER]
Hint:
1. Drag the Sunflower card onto the lawn to plant a Sunflower.
2. Sunflowers produce sun.

[ADVICE_IMG_ZOMBIE_HINT]
Hint:
1. Zombies will eat your plants.
2. Never let zombies reach the leftmost house!

[ADVICE_ANIM_PLANT_PEASHOOTER]
Hint:
1. Drag the Peashooter card onto the lawn to plant a Peashooter.
2. Peashooters attack incoming zombies.

[ADVICE_IMG_BUCKET_ZOMBIE]
Hint:
1. Buckethead Zombies have super sturdy buckets to withstand your attacks. Use ^00FF00 plant food^oldclrr when you have few plants!

[ADVICE_ANIM_PLANTFOOD]
Hint:
1. Drag plant food onto plants to unleash powerful plant food abilities!
2. The Peashooter's plant food ability can deal with very strong zombies.

[ADVICE_IMG_PF_ZOMBIE]
Hint:
1. Defeating zombies emitting green light will grant plant food, a big help for you to pass the level!

[ADVICE_ABOUT_PLANT_ARMORFLAME]
Please plant the Armor Flame Assembler on an empty space with 2 grids.

[ADVICE_ABOUT_PLANT_ARMORFLAME_ON_VINE]
The Armor Flame Assembler cannot be planted on vines.

Are you sure you want to start a new game? 
This will result in the loss of your current game progress.

[PROFILE_ERROR]
Unable to create a new game.

[STORE_CATEGORY_NAME_AVATAR_TICKET]
costume voucher

[AVATAR_TICKET_DESCRIPTION]
Event Rules:
1. Players can buy initial plant outfits using Outfit Tickets in the Plant Outfits section.
2. Outfit Tickets can be obtained from the Outfit Ticket Shop and events.
3. First-time purchases in the shop will grant bonus tickets:
   - ¥6 Pack: 60 tickets + 18 bonus
   - ¥30 Pack: 330 tickets + 132 bonus
   - ¥68 Pack: 780 tickets + 360 bonus
   - ¥128 Pack: 1550 tickets + 700 bonus
   - ¥328 Pack: 4100 tickets + 2050 bonus
   - ¥648 Pack: 8450 tickets + 4650 bonus
4. Outfit Tickets can only be used for initial outfits, not for special or rare outfits.
5. Rare and new plant outfits may be available for limited-time purchase.
6. Required Outfit Tickets for outfits:
   - White Plant: 60
   - Green Plant: 120
   - Blue Plant: 180
   - Purple Plant: 250
   - Special Purple: 500
   - Orange Plant: 400
   - Special Orange: 800

[AVATAR_TICKET_TITLE]
costume voucher Instructions

[STORE_CATEGORY_NAME_COINS]
Coins

[LUCKYCHEST_DES_DESCRIPTION]
666. sorry i really need to remove text :(

1. Event: April 1 to May 26. Complete mainline (Normal/Hard), Secret Realm, Endless, Penny's Pursuit, Memory, Duo Mode, or Stalemate Escape stages to gain daily progress.
2. Lucky chests are valid only during the event period.
3. Claim chests after 1, 5, or 10 daily completions. Progress resets daily.
4. Chests provide random in-game rewards.
5. Each chest can be open 3 time per day.
6. Chest quality probabilities: Normal 43%, Intermediate 29%, Advanced 17%, Epic 7%, Legendary 4%.
7. Example rewards: 
   - Normal
Green/Blue/Purple Fragment 30%/20%/20%
188/666 Diamonds 5%/2% 
Artifact Blessing Ticket 9%
150 voucher 1%.

   - Advanced: 
Purple/Orange Fragment 18.91%/15.12% 
188/666 Diamonds 8.45%/4.27%

   - Epic: 
Purple/Orange fragment 32.78%/27.22% 
5.5%/4.5% for avatar

    - Legendary: 
 Orange Fragments 74% 
25% for avatar)
1% for any other fragment

[NOTICE_CONTENT_FIRST]
Dear Player:
 
Dave arrives at the legendary Lost City for the magic taco! None of the various treasure hunters were spared to become zombies in this cursed earth.
 
Lost City Ruins Adventure
Sun Umbrella Zombie Immune Ejection, the guide zombie will open the dark path.
Pilot zombies fall from the sky and archaeological zombies attack from a distance.
The devil is one foot high and the Tao is one foot high. The Plant Legion also has new friends!
The golden toad mushroom can swallow zombies to produce sun, and the daisy is good at group slowdown.
Jackfruit can seal the secret passage, and the Red Needle has three forms.
 <image=IMAGE_UI_DIALOG_ASSET_NOTICE_BANNER_0 align=center width=1016 height=320>
 
The garden war is about to break out
New PvP function is turned on. Come and play PvP now and get 10 diamonds for each win, up to 50 diamonds a day!
There are also exciting PvP daily achievement activities for you to challenge, and rare plant pieces are waiting for you!
 <image=IMAGE_UI_DIALOG_ASSET_NOTICE_BANNER_4 align=center width=1016 height=320>
 
Six great gifts to welcome the New Year
From February 1st to February 15th, click on firecrackers to draw Spring Festival-limited plants, and play the ingot battle to win red envelopes
From February 7th to February 22nd, you can guess lantern riddles for free and win red envelopes
From February 1st to February 11th, you can win prizes by smashing golden eggs by recharging
There will be big rebates when you recharge from February 12th to February 22nd
From February 1st to February 22nd, you can get a free Package when you recharge
 <image=IMAGE_UI_DIALOG_ASSET_NOTICE_BANNER_1 align=center width=1016 height=320>

  sign-in plant surprises 
In February, the new plant kiwi fruit will be launched. If you insist on signing in, you can get second-level plants and generous diamond rewards!
 
  小pea

Dear plant buddies,
        The world of KongFu is ushering in an unprecedented major update!
        The Sceond part of the much-anticipated world of KongFu has been opened! Prepare your most powerful plant line-up, as the incredibly powerful Knife Master and his brother Gunpowder Demon will be stationed in the later stages of the KongFu waiting for your challenge!
        At the same time, Dr. Zombie also takes advantage of the chaos to appear! In the newly opened daily challenge, you'll encounter Doctor Zombie, and the difficulty will go harder and harder every time! Defeat him to get the latest top 5 plant costumes, and these new costumes will also give plants new abilities like never before!

[RECHARGE_NOTICE_DESC_FOR_LOTTERY]
Accumulate a total of 2 ¥ in the game, get double the gold coin income in the game, and buy gold coin plants faster!
With a total of 6 ¥, you can participate in 2 lucky draws every day! Lucky gifts for you to choose from!
If you recharge more than 10 ¥ in total, you will get a value-for-money random plant Pack!
Fill up 20 ¥ in total, permanently turn on 2 times the speed in the game, and fight zombies more powerfully!
If you charge 30 ¥ in total, you will immediately receive the in-game artifact - Cherry Bomb! Wide range of high damage!
Killing zombies instantly from now on is not a dream!

[CARROTLAUNCHER_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Range: {STAT} Arc trajectory
{KEYWORD}Trait: {STAT} Single-cell splash
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT} Orange plant, Weapon family
{FLAVOR}Carrot was a fervent fan of robot animation in his youth. His room was filled with various robot models, and he played almost every electronic game with a robot theme. He even tried to tattoo himself with tattoos representing certain robots. After becoming a scientist, he began to study frantically how to use solar energy as the power source for robots... Later, he applied his research results to himself. So someone called him Carrot Missile Launcher, but he prefers to call himself Kobvon.

[CARROTLAUNCHER_TOOLTIP]
Launches carrot missiles, dealing massive damage to zombies in front.

Dandelion

[DANDELION_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Range: {STAT} Single-cell damage
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT} White plant
{FLAVOR}Dandelion was once an ordinary literary youth. In his spare time, he liked to lie under a big tree to read books and look up at the sky. His dream was to become a pilot soaring in the blue sky. So when he grew up, he became an airport liaison officer... Yes, you didn't read it wrong, because incorrect reading posture for years caused his vision to deteriorate severely, and he failed the pilot physical examination!

[DANDELION_TOOLTIP]
Launches fluffs to deal massive damage to enemies in front.

{KEYWORD}Sun production: {STAT} little at first, normal then, much at the end.
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT} yellow plant, mushroom family, infinite sun
{FLAVOR}As everyone knows, Sun-shroom has an attractive grin and sunny disposition, but truth be told, even he has his dark days. Living in the shadows while keeping things light isn't easy.

[SUNSHROOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Sun-shroom can produce sun, and as it grows, more sun is obtained each time.

[SUNSHROOM_TOOLTIP]
Continuously provides more sun.

{FLAVOR}Puff-shroom knows everything about the newest internet trend. He can't pull himself away from "Shroombo", "ShroomChat" and "Shroomtu". But sometimes he misses the lawn gatherings of internet friends, that simple friendship is gone and will never return.

{FLAVOR}"I think of myself as a pretty confident and all-around mushroom," Fume-shroom said so. "But sometimes, when I ate Plant Food, I hear some plants chuckling. They call me 'Balloon-shroom'! They won't know how much that hurts!"

[SUNBEAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]

[DAILY_REWARD_COMPENSATION_CONTENT]
Dear players:

Due to some reasons we all know, the February sign-in version of Plants vs. Zombies 2 was not updated on time. To express our apologies to all players, Little Pea especially recovered the lost rewards for dear players in this update:
1. 100 diamonds
2. Sweet Potato Chips x10

Thank you for your support for Plants vs. Zombies 2, and I wish you a happy holiday in Plants vs. Zombies 2!

    Little Pea

[DAILY_REWARD_COMPENSATION_CONTENT_SPECIAL]
Dear players:

Due to some reasons we all know, the February sign-in version of Plants vs. Zombies 2 was not updated on time. To express our apologies to all players, Little Pea especially recovered the lost rewards for dear players in this update:
1. 100 diamonds
2. Sweet Potato Chips x10

After the launch of the Giant Wave Beach version, due to data corruption resulting in the disappearance or overabundance of Sweet Potato, Lily Pad, Chomper, Bowling Bulb, 4 plants, we have restored them according to the pieces and levels before the error, and given players a compensation of 50 diamonds.

Thank you for your support for Plants vs. Zombies 2, and I wish you a happy holiday in Plants vs. Zombies 2!

    Little Pea

[REWARD_RULE_TITLE]
Reward rules

[REWARD_RULE_TEXT]
Rules of play:
1. There are 2 free challenges per day, and the number of challenges will be reset at 12 am that day.
2. The event settles the ranking reward every 7 days, and you can only claim the ranking reward from the previous issue after the end of each event.
 3. The number of awards is related to your all-time high in the previous issue.
Reward rules:
 1st place 800 diamonds
 2nd 500 Diamonds
 3rd 400 Diamonds
 4th-10th 300 Diamonds
 11th-100th 200 Diamonds
 101st-1000th 150 Diamonds
Lv.9 myth maker(3500000 points) 108 diamonds
Lv.8 zombie terminator(3000000 points) 88 diamonds
Lv.7 zombie butcher(2500000 points) 68 diamonds
Lv.6 zombie nemesis(2000000 points) 58 diamonds
Lv.5 zombie killer(1500000 points) 48 diamonds
Lv.4 Master Zombie Hunter (1000000 points) 38 diamonds
Lv.3 skilled hunter(500000 points) 28 diamonds
Lv.2 rookie hunter(100000 points) 18 diamonds
Lv.1 Novice on the road (0 points) 8 diamonds

[SUPER_ACCESSORY_STEADY_DES_TITLE]
Enhancement Instructions

[SUPER_ACCESSORY_STEADY_DES_DESCRIPTION]
1. The pendant reinforcement object can only be a new super pendant
2. Super pendants require further reinforcement with specific materials
3. The reinforcement consumption is as follows:
          Initial strengthening to level 1:20 dusts    1000 gold coins
          Level 1 strengthened to Level 2: 30 dusts    1,500 gold coins
          Level 2 is strengthened to level 3: 50 dusts, 2,000 gold coins, and 5 space-time crystals
          Level 3 is strengthened to level 4: 70 dusts    2,000 gold coins, and 15 space-time crystals
          Level 4 is strengthened to level 5: 100 dusts    2,000 gold coins, and 30 space-time crystals

[XSHOT]
Rotobaga

[XSHOT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Rotobaga can launch bullets along 4 diagonal directions, aiming at one target in each direction.

[XSHOT_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Range: {STAT} Shoots in four directions
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT} Purple plant, Flying plant
{FLAVOR} Sometimes Rotobaga overhears other plants gossiping. Did you notice? So-and-so has gained weight. They'll say things like that, or I heard so-and-so is dating so-and-so, can you believe it? But Rotobaga isn't into that kind of gossip. She's more interested in surpassing others than gossiping behind their backs.

[XSHOT_TOOLTIP]
Shoots bullets along 4 diagonal directions.

[XSHOT_PLANTFOOD]
Quickly shoots a stream of bullets in 4 diagonal directions.

[SUGARCANE]
Bamboo Brother

[SUGARCANE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Sugarcane can withstand zombies, stopping them from advancing.

[SUGARCANE_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT} The fewer zombies there are, the longer it can hold out.
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT} Gradually recovers when not holding off zombies.
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT} Green plant, Highly skilled
{FLAVOR} Sugarcane started running errands for a theater troupe in the neighboring town since he was young. From playing small roles since childhood, he hoped to one day become the mainstay of the troupe. So he diligently practiced various martial arts, finally mastering the continuous backflip. One day, Sugarcane received his first starring role, the main plot of which goes like this: One day, in the forest, a fierce wolf kidnapped a little pig, and the pig's brave mother bravely sought the wolf's den to rescue it...

[SUGARCANE_TOOLTIP]
Withstands zombies, blocking their advance.

[SUGARCANE_PLANTFOOD]
Leaps into the air, knocking back and stunning zombies for a period of time.

[ROSESWORDMAN]
Rose Swordsman

[ROSESWORDMAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Rose Swordsman can attack approaching zombies and unleash powerful attacks against low-health zombies.

[ROSESWORDMAN_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT} Launches powerful attacks against low-health zombies.
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT} Red plant, Highly skilled
{FLAVOR} This mysterious swordsman from the distant East calls himself Versailles Gao. He always boasts of being an artist ahead of his time while drinking in the tavern. These rude fellows can't understand what I'm trying to express! he often complains, That famous singer Sunflower, I once painted a groundbreaking portrait of her, but she claimed it was garbage! This was the only portrait I painted besides the rose! I even deliberately signed my initials below the painting, I bet just that signature alone would make it a priceless treasure... *hiccup~*

[ROSESWORDMAN_TOOLTIP]
Attacks approaching zombies, dealing massive damage to low-health zombies.

[ROSESWORDMAN_PLANTFOOD]
Unleashes sword energy to attack zombies within a certain range in front.

{FLAVOR} Before becoming the dazzling magic mushroom, the magic mushroom was just the most common round-headed mushroom in the mushroom village, but it all changed when it came into contact with the magic world. Right! I'm a dazzling star! Magic Mushroom skillfully plays the poker in his hand, which is what he considers his most handsome gesture. Don't foolishly think that there's a rabbit hidden in the Magic Mushroom's hat, and you're done lifting it!

[MAGICSHROOM_PLANTFOOD]

{FLAVOR} Little Chestnuts like to live together the most. When someone asks why, they will proudly tell the story of a group of newly graduated little chestnuts huddled in a hut and struggling hard, supporting each other, and vowing to come out of the chestnut field. Of course, at the end of the story, they will not forget to complain about the bad behavior of a certain little chestnut nicknamed pretty boy that occupies too much space. . . . . And Mozhu, who has known them for many years, told the truth in one sentence:They just have no money to pay the rent.

[CHESTNUT_PLANTFOOD]

[PEPPERPULT]
Chili Pepper Pitcher

[PEPPERPULT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Chili pepper pitchers throwing flame peppers at zombies can also freeze the plants around them.

[PEPPERPULT_DESCRIPTION]
{KEYWORD}Special: {STAT} warms the grid around it
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT} orange plant, covered in fire
{FLAVOR} Some people say that pepper pitchers are a little prone to fever. Some find his fiery personality unappetizing. But the truth is, he's just more focused and persistent. He loves what he does. He thanked himself for everything he had. I am from the weed area of the lawn, pepper pitcher explains. I work hard to take root and make myself established. I'm a self-reliant chili pepper and I don't think anything's taken for granted.

[PEPPERPULT_TOOLTIP]
Flame peppers are dropped and the plants around them are frozen

Red Stinger fires bullets when near the home base and gains defensive capabilities when away from home.

[REDSTINGER_TOOLTIP]
Fires bullets when near the home base and gains defensive capabilities when away from home.

[REDSTINGER_PLANTFOOD]
Fires an energy beam to attack zombies in a straight line ahead.

[DANGERROOM_REWARD_MSG]
Battle Plant pieces

[DANGERROOM_RULE_BTN_TXT]
Rules

[DANGERROOM_REWARD_BTN_TXT]
Score Rewards

[DANGERROOM_RULE_TXT]

666. sorry i need to remove a lot of text or the game will not show anything!

1. Endless Challenge mode opens on Thu-Sun, with holiday adjustments.
2. Each session features a different world, with previews on non-open days and recommended plants listed.
3. Endless Training is available for practice, but no points or medals are earned.
4. On open days, players can spend diamonds to reset. Sat-Sun offer one free reset.
5. Points are earned after clearing levels; current points reset after a challenge, but highest points stay for leaderboard.
6. Medals are awarded after clearing levels and can be used in the shop.
7. Sun, tactical cucumbers, lawnmowers, artifact uses, and remaining plants carry over but reset after a full reset.
8. Tactical cucumber count is separate from other modes.
9. Plant usage has a limit, but restores slightly after each level.
10. Boss levels appear every 5th level with a free card draw.
11. After the second challenge, levels can be skipped.
12. Special zombies may appear.

[DANGERROOM_RULE_TXT2]
Made by evil :)

[MINIGAME_RULE_TXT2]
Fun Race Challenge Instructions

[MINIGAME_RULE_TXT]
1. The fun competition will be open from June 17, to  June 30. A new mini-game will be available each day.

2. During the event, players have no limit on the number of daily challenges. Players will earn points and enhancement energy upon successfully completing mini-game levels.

3. Points earned from completing levels include base points and time-based points. For normal levels, base points are 1000, with a time-based point cap of 500. For hard levels, base points are 2000, with a time-based point cap of 500.

4. Time-based points are awarded based on the time taken to complete the level.

5. After completing a mini-game, players can redeem rewards based on the points earned.

6. Points earned in mini-games can be converted into enhancement energy at a certain ratio.

7. Enhancement energy can be used to strengthen mini-games, granting corresponding enhancement effects.

{FLAVOR} Last week, other plants held an extremely grand surprise party for the escape tree roots, but after he did something, the person he was surprised to suddenly turned into. . . . . . Other plants!

[ESCAPEROOT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
Escape from tree roots explodes when hit, and can swap locations with other endangered plants.

[ESCAPEROOT_TOOLTIP]
Explosions occur and positions can be exchanged with other plants

[SETTINGS_DATASHARING_PROMPT_DISABLED]
The data sharing feature of the game has been disabled. Apart from the data you directly provide to Tuo Wei, specific information will be collected by Tuo Wei to improve the products and services provided to you. This includes software upgrades, dynamically adjusted content, product support, and communication with you to enhance your experience using Tuo Wei products and services. This data will not be shared with any third parties and will not be used to identify you. When you disable data sharing, Tuo Wei will still continue to collect some reasonable information, except for anonymous information, to ensure the operation of products and services. Would you like to enable data sharing?

{KEYWORD}Characteristics: {STAT} Shrinks imp zombies to the point of invisibility.
{KEYWORD}Plant features: {STAT} Purple plant, short
