Lucky Wheel

[NEW_PVP_TASK_INTERGAL]
Duel Coins

[NEW_PVP_TASK_INTERGAL_TIPS]
Currently have {NUM} Duel Coins

[NEW_PVP_TASK_DESCRIPTION_TITLE]
Task Activity Instructions

[NEW_PVP_TASK_DESCRIPTION]
Activity Rules:


[NEW_PVP_TASK_DESCRIPTION_30]
1. Earn XP via daily/weekly challenges. 1000 XP = 1 level up + rewards.
2. 3 daily task slots (refresh 3/day). New tasks only add to empty slots.
3. 4 weekly tasks unlock progressively, available until season end.
4. Rewards improve with level. Duel Coins till Lv50, then 10-level cycles. Coins expire post-season.
5. Premium Pass: 
   - Unlocks premium rewards
   - +20% XP
   - Instant 270 Coins + season plant
6. Spend Coins in Lucky Wheel (20 rewards total). Lv50+Premium = claim all.
7. Wheel: One-time rewards. Initial odds:
   Gold/Diamonds ~22.5% 
   Plants: Green 11.3%, Blue 7.9%, Purple 11.3%, Orange 2.5%
   Accessories: 19.3% (Super 2.0%)
   Rare: Selectable Box 0.2%, Book 0.1%

[NEW_PVP_TASK_DESCRIPTION_31]
1. Earn XP via daily/weekly challenges. 1000 XP = 1 level up + rewards.
2. 3 daily task slots (refresh 3/day). New tasks only add to empty slots.
3. 4 weekly tasks unlock progressively, available until season end.
4. Rewards improve with level. Duel Coins till Lv50, then 10-level cycles. Coins expire post-season.
5. Premium Pass: 
   - Unlocks premium rewards
   - +20% XP
   - Instant 270 Coins + season plant
6. Spend Coins in Lucky Wheel (20 rewards total). Lv50+Premium = claim all.
7. Wheel: One-time rewards. Initial odds:
   Gold/Diamonds ~22.5% 
   Plants: Green 11.3%, Blue 7.9%, Purple 11.3%, Orange 2.5%
   Accessories: 19.3% (Super 2.0%)
   Rare: Selectable Box 0.2%, Book 0.1%

[NEW_PVP_TASK_DESCRIPTION_32]
1. Earn XP via daily/weekly challenges. 1000 XP = 1 level up + rewards.
2. 3 daily task slots (refresh 3/day). New tasks only add to empty slots.
3. 4 weekly tasks unlock progressively, available until season end.
4. Rewards improve with level. Duel Coins till Lv50, then 10-level cycles. Coins expire post-season.

   - Instant 270 Coins + season plant

[NEW_PVP_SHOP]
PvP Shop

[NEW_PVP_SHOP_INFO_TITLE]
PvP Shop Rules

[NEW_PVP_SHOP_INFO_DETAIL]
1. Shop items refresh daily at 00:00 (UTC+8) , resetting item purchase limits.
2. Pvp coin can be obtained through daily and weekly chests and used to exchange for various items in the shop.
3. Seasonal Legendary Chests and Seasonal Normal Chests usually contain newly introduced zombies for the season,Regular Legendary Chest includes all released zombies.
4. The Seasonal Legendary Chest and the Regular Legendary Chest's rewards include 310 cards of a random common zombie, 100 cards of a rare zombie, 5 cards of a legendary zombie, and 10 Pvp coin from the pool.  
5. The Seasonal Normal Chest rewards include 50 cards of a random common zombie, 15 cards of a rare zombie, 3 Pvp coin, and 60 diamonds.

[NEW_PVP_SHOP_RESET_TIMER]
Shop Reset Countdown

[WORLD_LEVEL_PACKAGE_TITLE]
Penny's Journey

[WORLD_LEVEL_PACKAGE_TIPS_TITLE]
Activity Description

[WORLD_LEVEL_PACKAGE_TIPS_DESC]
1.  Pack opening follows the progress of the world, offering Packs with different contents at different stages in different worlds.
2.  Pack opening requires the player to collect the stars within the level.
3.  The Pack is open for a limited time of 3 days, after the end it will no longer be displayed and cannot be purchased.

[CORNUCOPIA_LEVEL_DESC]
{NUM1} / {NUM2}

[CORNUCOPIA_MAIN_TIPS_INFO]
Rules:
1. Earn Lucky Coins by collecting or purchasing bundles. Use them in the event for rewards. Coins are valid only during the event.
2. Each draw grants Badges and random rewards, with a chance to win 5000 Diamonds.

Reward Probabilities:
Badge 1: 50%, 2: 35%, 3: 15%
Diamonds 10: 24.99%, 30: 8.33%, 50: 4.16%, 5000: 0.05%
Orange Piece 1: 8.33%, Purple 2: 12.49%, Blue 2: 16.66%, Green 5: 24.99%.

3. Purchase Lucky Bundles for extra Coins, EXP, and Diamonds.
4. Level up the Cornucopia via tasks or bundles. Higher levels boost Coin generation and unlock slots. Levels reset after the event.
5. Free Coins generate periodically and can be claimed by collecting bubbles. Max 5 bubbles.
6. Use Badges to redeem items in the store. Some require specific Cornucopia levels. Badges expire after the event.
7. Each draw adds Diamonds to a global pool. At event end, players ranked share the pool:
Ranks 1-50: 0.5% each (200+ draws), 51-150: 0.25% (160+), 151-300: 0.2% (120+), 301-500: 0.1% (80+).

[CORNUCOPIA_PROGRESS_TIPS_INFO]
After 10 draws, diamond count is increased by 1.

[PRODUCT_PLANT_CULTIVATE_20_SHORTDESC]
Plant Cultivation Purchase Restriction Pack

[INVITATION_MAIN_TIPS_INFO]
1. This event will run from January 21, 2025 to March 16, 2025.
2. After clearing the 6 day of the Mysterious Egypt, players can recruit others.
3. During the event, you can earn tokens through recruitment tasks or daily sharing. These tokens can be used for recruitment draws to win great rewards. 
   After each event ends, the shop closes and excess tokens are recycled.
4. Recruitment Rules:
   Invited players must meet at least one of the following conditions:
   1. New accounts created during the event period and cleared the sixth day of Mysterious Egypt.
   2. Have not logged in for more than 30 days.
   (Each player can only be recruited once per event.)
   Once the recruited player enters the invitation code, the recruitment is considered successful, and they will immediately receive a reward.
   Each player can recruit up to 100 players.
    Android invitation codes can only invite Android players, and iOS invitation codes can only invite iOS players.

[UIINVITATION_REWARD_BOX_0]
Artificial advanced book select one more Pack

[DAVEKITCHEN_DESCRIPTION_TITLE]
Dave Kitchen Events

[DAVEKITCHEN_DESCRIPTION]
1. After completing challenges in multiple modes (Chase, Duo, Endless, Memory), players can collect corn and water from daily tasks. The tasks reset at 24:00 each day.
2. Players can make various corn rolls using different ingredients. After players will receive rewards from Dave, with the following probabilities:
    - Mega Corn Roll:
    (2) Targeted Fragment 60%
    (1) Mangosteen 30%
    (3) Advanced Book 10%
    - Barbecue Corn Roll: 
    (1) Artifact Ticket 40%
    (2) Targeted Fragment 30%
    (3) Chestnut Brothers 30%
    - Smoked Meat Corn Roll:
    (1) Artifact Ticket 40%
    (2) Abyss Anemone 30%
    (3) Legendary potion 30%
    - Vegetable Corn Roll:
    (1) 100 Diamonds 40%
    (2) Thorn Fruit Meteor Hammer Fragment 40%
    (3) Purple potion 20%
    - Corn Roll:
    (1) 30 Diamonds 40%
    (2) Infi-nut 40%
    (3) Blue potion 20%
3. Left ingredients can be exchanged for diamonds, coins, and other items. Excess ingredients will not carry over to the next event.

[DAVEKITCHEN_SHORT_DESCRIPTION]
Help Dave make delicious corn rolls with the probability of getting diamonds, artifact blessing coupons, advanced books and other thanks.

[PLANT_FIGHTZODIAC_SHORT_DESCRIPTION]
Exchange the obtained firecrackers for rewards from Dave, with various plant piece!

[PARTY_ASSIST_CHOOSE_REWARD_TITLE]
Select Wish Rewards

[PARTY_ASSIST_ACTIVITY_COLLECTION_DESC]
Participate in party assistance, help climb levels, win various rare rewards, and have a chance to get ultra-rare costumes

[PARTY_ASSIST_TIPS_DESC]
Activity Rules:
1. Select 3 custom rewards before starting. Rewards are given at corresponding levels.
2. After 3 rounds reaching level 10, you'll get the Angel Starfruit outfit.
3. Each assistance increases progress by one level. There's a 10% chance for a Super Reward per level. After 3 rounds at level 10, the Super Reward is guaranteed.
4. After reaching level 10, reset custom rewards. Players at level 5+ can manually reset.
5. Complete tasks to get rewards; required outfits can be earned in custom rewards.
6. Tokens and progress do not carry over. Remaining tokens are converted to diamonds at a 1:10 ratio.
7. Convert tokens into diamonds in the backpack after the event. Unused tokens will be cleared in the next version.

[FUTURE_GIFT_TITLE]
Future Gift Box Event

[FUTURE_GIFT_DESCRIPTION]
Event Rules:
1. The gift box contains various preset items. Players can choose several rewards to place in the slots. After purchasing the selected content Pack, corresponding items can be obtained.
2. Each Pack can only be purchased once per day.
3. There are 6 level of Packs, each containing different contents.
4. When all items of the gift box are purchased, rewards will automatically be refreshes (without consuming refresh times).

[PENNY_GIFT_SHORT_DESCRIPTION]
Open Penny's Future Gift Box for great rewards

[PENNY_GIFT_DESCRIPTION_TITLE]
Penny's Future Gift Box Event Details

[PENNY_GIFT_DESCRIPTION]
1. Select gift box types from Penny's menu (min 3 categories). 8 random boxes form the reward pool.
2. Spend Penny Coins to buy boxes. Discounts apply based on boxes purchased in current round.
3. Each purchase grants fixed rewards + bonus items/diamonds (see "?" for details).
4. Auto-refresh new rewards when all boxes are bought (free).
5. Unlock personal progress rewards by purchasing multiple boxes (more coins = better rewards).
6. Contribute to server-wide progress by buying boxes (minimum 1 purchase required to claim).
7. Top-ranked players (by total coins spent) earn extra rewards at season end.
8. Unused Penny Coins convert to diamonds (1:10) after event.
9. Bonus item odds:
   - Upgrade Materials: 33.33%
   - Plants/Costumes: 10.00%

[NFS_LINKAGE_TAB1]
New Year Sign-In

[NFS_LINKAGE_TAB2]
¥bao Tasks

[NFS_LINKAGE_TAB3]
Exchange Shop

[NFSLINKAGE_DESCRIPTION_TITLE]
¥bao Battle Description

[NFSLINKAGE_DESCRIPTION]
Event Rules:
1. Players can log in daily during the event period to receive valuable rewards. The sign-in rewards last for 14 days.
2. ¥bao tasks are divided into daily tasks and event tasks. Daily tasks refresh at 0:00 daily and can be completed once per day.
3. Event tasks have multiple stages. Only after completing one stage will the next stage be unlocked.
4. Completing ¥bao tasks will reward ¥bao, which can be used to exchange items in the exchange shop.
5. ¥bao can be exchanged in the shop only during the event period, so be sure to exchange in time!

[NFSLINKAGE_TITLE]

[MAT_NFSLINKAGE_TICKET]
¥bao

[ACTIVITY_NFSLINKAGE_REASURE_SHORT_DESCRIPTION]
During the event, players can log in to receive 14 days of rewards. Complete tasks to earn ¥bao and exchange them for rewards in the shop!

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_HUNTER_ELITE]
Elite Hunter Zombie

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_HUNTER_ELITE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
The Elite Hunter Zombie has a toughness bar mechanism. Fire attribute attacks can reduce its toughness (burning attacks can cause significant reductions). Emptying the toughness bar will cause the zombie to enter a weakened state, during which it will neither act nor attack until the toughness bar is restored. When the zombie has toughness, it provides a damage absorption limit effect.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_HUNTER_ELITE_DESCRIPTION]
Actually, zombies also hold sports events every 4 years. The Elite Hunter Zombie has won the championship from the first event to... um... which edition is it now? In any case, it is the champion among champions.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_WEASELHOARDER_ELITE]
Elite Ice Weasel Zombie

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_WEASELHOARDER_ELITE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
The Elite Ice Weasel Zombie has a toughness bar mechanism. Fire attribute attacks can reduce its toughness (burning attacks can cause significant reductions). Emptying the toughness bar will cause the zombie to enter a weakened state, during which it will neither act nor attack until the toughness bar is restored. When the zombie has toughness, it provides a damage absorption limit effect.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_WEASELHOARDER_ELITE_DESCRIPTION]
One day, the Ice Weasel Zombie found a new hollow piece of wood and discovered a frozen squirrel with two sharp fangs inside. Next to it was a pine cone. The Ice Weasel Zombie and the weasel nibbled on the pine cone, and then they became Elite Ice Weasel Zombies.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_CHIEF_ELITE]
Elite Icewind Chieftain Zombie

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_CHIEF_ELITE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
The Elite Icewind Chieftain Zombie has a toughness bar mechanism. Fire attribute attacks can reduce its toughness (burning attacks can cause significant reductions). Emptying the toughness bar will cause the zombie to enter a weakened state, during which it will neither act nor attack until the toughness bar is restored. When the zombie has toughness, it provides a damage absorption limit effect.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEAGE_CHIEF_ELITE_DESCRIPTION]
After a routine attack, the Icewind Chieftain Zombie discovered that the guy in the cave with the flat-bottomed pot took out a fan device. The Icewind Chieftain Zombie was blown away by it. After being blown away repeatedly, the Icewind Chieftain Zombie has now learned how to counter the fan device.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEYEARMONSTER]
Frost Year Beast Zombie

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEYEARMONSTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
The Frost Year Beast Zombie has a toughness bar mechanism. Fire attribute attacks can reduce its toughness (burning attacks can cause significant reductions). Emptying the toughness bar will cause the zombie to enter a weakened state, during which it will neither act nor attack until the toughness bar is restored. When the zombie has toughness, it provides a damage absorption limit effect.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_ICEYEARMONSTER_DESCRIPTION]
After training in the Ice Age, it no longer fears red or explosive attacks.

[ACTIVITY_NEW_AUTUMN_HARVEST_DIAMOND_TITLE]
Diamond Accumulation

[ACTIVITY_NEW_AUTUMN_HARVEST_GOTO_BUTTON]
Share Prize Pool

[ACTIVITY_NEW_AUTUMN_HARVEST_TIPS]
Diamond Pool Explanation:
1. Base prize pool of 200,000 diamonds. For every player participating in the event's lottery, the pool increases by 50 diamonds per draw.
2. The highest prize is 10% of the total pool!

[ACTIVITY_NEW_AUTUMN_HARVEST_MAIN_TIPS]
Event Details:
1. Purchase Packs to earn Farm Coins and win super prizes, including artifacts and large amounts of diamonds!
2. You can draw up to 30 times for selectable rewards and up to 90 times for Super Corn.
3. After the event ends, tokens will be converted into diamonds at a rate of 1:30 for Farm Coins and 1:500 for Super Corn.
4. If both guarantees are triggered in one draw, the selectable reward will be prioritized. The next draw will definitely give you Super Corn.

[TOURISMOCTOBER_TASK_NAME_9 ]
Start 15 plant explorations.

[TOURISMOCTOBER_TASK_NAME_001 ]
Achieve 6 stars in the Zombie Escape mode.

[TOURISMOCTOBER_TASKDAY_TIPS_LABEL]
Daily Tasks

[TOURISMOCTOBER_TASK_TIPS_LABEL]
Monthly Tasks

[TOURISMOCTOBER_TASKSPECIAL_TIPS_LABEL]
Personal Task

[TOURISMOCTOBER_TASKDAY_TIPS_INFO]
Daily tasks refresh every day, with a maximum of 3069 coin available!

[TOURISMOCTOBER_TASK_TIPS_INFO]
Monthly tasks last until October 31.

[TOURISMOCTOBER_MAIN_TIPS_INFO]
1. Players can earn event coin by completing daily tasks, monthly tasks, and personal tasks.
2. Event coin can be exchanged for rewards in the exchange shop. Coin will not carry over to the next phase.
3. Daily tasks refresh daily, while monthly and personal tasks do not refresh and can only be completed once.
4. Each squad can have up to three members. The first player to accept another player into the squad becomes the captain!
5. Once in a squad, only the captain can decide whether to accept new members. Joined members cannot enter an invitation code again.
6. When a squad member completes a task, other squad members can also claim the same amount of rewards.
7. Complete personal challenges to earn more points for rewards! (Challenge coin are personal - teammates don't share rewards)"

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_MIRROR_QUEEN_PHASE3]
Elite Mirror Queen Zombie
[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_MIRROR_QUEEN_PHASE3_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
The Elite Mirror Queen Zombie has a resilience bar mechanism; physical attacks can reduce its resilience (stunning effects can cause high reductions). Emptying the resilience bar puts the zombie into a weakened state, during which the zombie will not act or attack until the resilience bar is fully restored. While the zombie has resilience, it provides damage absorption limits.

[ZOMBIE_PLANTWARS_MIRROR_QUEEN_PHASE3_DESCRIPTION]
The Mirror Queen Zombie spends a lot of time each day indulging in her reflection. She fantasizes that her reflection is stronger and more beautiful than she is now. One day, the mirror finally responded to the queen's wish.

[TOY_NIGHT_EXPIRED]
High Voltage Expired Rewards

[TOY_NIGHT_MAIN_TIPS_INFO]
Event Rules:
1. Purchase packs to obtain High voltage battery. Spend coins to draw rewards. High voltage battery and Battery won't carry over - convert to diamonds post-event (10:1 and 1:1 ratios).
2. Each draw may yield Battery or other rewards. Lucky players may directly win Mangosteen Super costume.
3. After 20 unsuccessful draws, the next draw guarantees a prize from the premium pool.
4. Duplicate Super costume auto-convert to 200 Battery.

Guaranteed Prize Pool:
Mangosteen Super costume:   3.72%
Battery*1300:    5.28%
Battery*700:     12.55%
Battery*500:     11.10%
Diamonds*1888:        32.17%
Penny's Treasure*10:  35.18%

Base Reward Probabilities:
Mangosteen Super costume:   0.17%
Battery*1300:    0.21%
Battery*700:     0.43%
Battery*500:     0.85%
Battery*100:     6.09%
Battery*50:      16.00%
Battery*20:      12.00%
Battery*10:      35.00%
Costume Coupon*500:   2.50%

[GINGLEBELL_TITLE]
Jingle Bells

[GINGLEBELL_TIPS]
Event closed

[GINGLEBELL_RANK_DAMAGE_TEXT]
All damages

[GINGLEBELL_RANK_TEXT]
Top {NUMBER}% of the server

[GINGLEBELL_RANK_TEXT_1]
Participation Award

[GINGLEBELL_RECORD]
Best Score

[GINGLEBELL_DESCRIPTION_TITLE]
Jingle Bells Description

[GINGLEBELL_DESCRIPTION]
Event Rules:
    1. All damage dealt to Gargantuar within time limit counts as clearance score.
    2. Scores from newly unlocked stages complete daily missions (refreshed daily).
    3. Three themes unlock sequentially (Flame, Electric, Physical), each with 3 stages. New stage every 2 days, new theme every 6 days.
    4. Special mechanics for current themes:
   - After dealing X number of flame/Electric/physical damage (respective to each theme), you can deal one massive damage hit.
   - Gargantuars resist to all damage types EXCEPT the current theme's type.
    5. Leaderboards rank by total score across current theme's 3 stages. Frozen daily 00:00-10:00 after new themes unlock (no gameplay during ranking). Non-current theme plays don't affect rankings.
    6. Ranking rewards auto-distribute after 10:00. On May 17th, extends to 24 hours (no challenges allowed).
    7. Players with abnormal scores will have current event scores excluded from rankings.

Your Rank: {NUMBER}

[ZOMBIE_UNIVERSE_UNCHARTED_GARGANTUAR_BASIC_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]

[ZOMBIE_UNIVERSE_UNCHARTED_GARGANTUAR_BASIC_DESCRIPTION]
{FLAVOR}In this universe 

[ZOMBIE_UNIVERSE_UNCHARTED_PHARAOH]
精英冰风酋长僵尸

[ZOMBIE_UNIVERSE_UNCHARTED_PHARAOH_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
精英冰风酋长僵尸具备韧性条机制，火属性攻击可削减其韧性（灼烧攻击可以进行高额削减），清空韧性条将使僵尸进入虚弱状态，该状态下僵尸不会行动及进攻，直至韧性条恢复完毕。当僵尸拥有韧性值时，可为其提供承伤上限效果。

[ZOMBIE_UNIVERSE_UNCHARTED_PHARAOH_DESCRIPTION]
在某次日常的进攻后，冰风酋长僵尸发现对面洞穴里面那个头戴平底锅的家伙拿出了一个扇子的装置，然后冰风酋长僵尸就被吹飞了，被吹的多了，现在冰风酋长僵尸学会了怎么对抗那个扇子装置了。

[ZOMBIE_UNIVERSE_UNCHARTED_JUGGLER_DESCRIPTION]

[ZOMBIE_UNIVERSE_UNCHARTED_LOSTCITY_JANE]

[ZOMBIE_UNIVERSE_UNCHARTED_LOSTCITY_JANE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]

精英冰风酋长僵尸

[ZOMBIE_UNIVERSE_UNCHARTED_RA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER]
精英冰风酋长僵尸具备韧性条机制，火属性攻击可削减其韧性（灼烧攻击可以进行高额削减），清空韧性条将使僵尸进入虚弱状态，该状态下僵尸不会行动及进攻，直至韧性条恢复完毕。当僵尸拥有韧性值时，可为其提供承伤上限效果。

[ZOMBIE_UNIVERSE_UNCHARTED_RA_DESCRIPTION]
在某次日常的进攻后，冰风酋长僵尸发现对面洞穴里面那个头戴平底锅的家伙拿出了一个扇子的装置，然后冰风酋长僵尸就被吹飞了，被吹的多了，现在冰风酋长僵尸学会了怎么对抗那个扇子装置了。

[ZOMBIE_UNIVERSE_UNCHARTED_HEIAN_AKINNDO]

[NEWYEAR_PACK_TITLE]
Celebration Bundle

[NEWYEAR_PACK_TEN]
10x Guaranteed:

[NEWYEARPACK_DESCRIPTION_TITLE]
Event Description

[NEWYEARPACK_DESCRIPTION]
Celebration Pack Purchase Instructions:
1. After purchasing the pack, you will definitely receive diamond rewards, with a probability to obtain a selectable costume box.
2. There is a guarantee mechanism for the packs. If you purchase the same type of pack nine times without obtaining a costume box, the next purchase will guarantee a costume box.
3. The purchase limit for packs refreshes daily, but the guarantee counter does not refresh and can be carried over.
4. The obtained costume box will be stored in your backpack. After use, you can select one costume from the box to obtain.
5. The current costume chest expires after the event end

[NEWYEARPACK_MAIN_TIPS_INFO]
Celebration Accumulated Recharge Instructions:
   During the event, recharging anywhere in the game will accumulate progress on the recharge progress bar.


Daily Free Gift: Diamonds*15
2 ¥ Benefit Pack: Diamonds*30, 10% chance to obtain Basic Costume Box
3 ¥ Benefit Pack: Diamonds*90, 10% chance to obtain Intermediate Costume Box
6 ¥ Benefit Pack: diamonds*180, 10% chance to obtain advanced Costume Box

[UINEWYEARREDPACKET_DES_DESCRIPTION]
1. The event red note at fixed times daily: 12:00-14:00 and 18:00-21:00 (UTC+8). You can claim one red packet between the hour, with a max of 2 red packets per day.
2. From January 27th to February 9th, a lucky player will be selected from all servers (one iOS and one Android) at 21:00 daily, to win a amazing reward.
3. On special dates (New Year's Eve, New Year's Day, Fifth Day), an additional prize lottery is available once per day. From 00:00 to 21:59 on New Year's Eve, New Year's Day, and Fifth Day, you can use lottery tickets to sign up for the prize draw on the event page.
4. Each time a player consumes a lottery ticket, their information is recorded. The prizes will be drawn from all registered participants at 22:00 on New Year's Eve, New Year's Day, and Fifth Day.
5. If the daily lucky prize is not claimed before the next day's drawing, it will be considered forfeited.
6. The physical prize is a ^CDBE70 5g *Plants vs. Zombies 2* custom gold banknote ^oldclr. The reward will be based on the actual physical item.
